name: GoMacro Dark Chocolate & Almonds Protein Bar
description: Rich Peruvian dark chocolate, lightly toasted almonds and the perfect chew make every bite one to savour. This Protein Decadence bar is packed with 10g of plant-based protein.Ingredients: organic brown rice syrup, organic almond butter, organic protein blend (organic sprouted brown rice protein, organic pea protein), organic puffed brown rice, organic almonds, organic fair-trade chocolate chips (organic coconut sugar, organic cocoa, organic cocoa butter), organic sunflower seed butter, organic cacao powder, organic coconut sugar, organic vanilla flavor, sea salt.Manufactured in a facility that processes peanuts and other nuts.May contain pit or nutshell fragments.
